titles.title: A resolution designating September 30, 2014, as "United States and India Partnership Day".
A resolution designating September 30, 2014, as "United States and India Partnership Day".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Designates September 30, 2014, as United States and India Partnership Day.
Recognizes that the U.S.-India relationship is a special and permanent bond.
